ActorRoleobject

parser.t[3901]

Superclass

Summary

Property
Details

Method
Details

ActorRole is a special role for the addressee of a command (BOB, GO NORTH, or TELL BOB TO GO NORTH). This doesn't appear as part of a predicate structure, so there's no matchProp, but it is used within the Command. **`ActorRole`**` :   `[`NounRole`](../object/NounRole.html)
